page.title: 08TRAVEL TO & FROM BEMPTON
page.content: We are fortunate in having as part of our transport network, a { {British Rail}station on the southern outskirts of the village. This gives a direct link with {Bridlington}to the south and {Scarborough}to the north. Of concern to residents in general and to the {Parish Council}in particular is an unmanned automatic open level crossing at Buckton. This type of crossing has no barriers.Already there has been one { {crash}involving a tracor and a train which resulted in a derailment. Fortunately there were no severe injuries. The roads in the area have to deal with considerably increased numbers of vehicles during the holiday season. Many of the roads are narrow and often have vehicles parked on them leading to obvious difficulties.
